publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5598 Mr David Davidson: Road Tolling—That the Parliament opposes the introduction of any additional nationwide charges for using Scotland’s existing roads and calls for the repeal of Part 3 of the Transport (Scotland) Act 2001.

S2M-5598 Mr David Davidson: Road Tolling—That the Parliament opposes the introduction of any additional nationwide charges for using Scotland’s existing roads and calls for the repeal of Part 3 of the Transport (Scotland) Act 2001.
